title: Chocolate Cake with Cream Cheese Icing
ingredients: ['375g plain flour', '400g caster sugar', '45g unsweetened cocoa powder', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '475ml hot water', '1 tablespoon instant coffee powder', '150ml vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons white vinegar', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 eggs', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '225g cream cheese', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 egg', '170g plain chocolate chips', '120g finely chopped walnuts']
